snippet.title: LOVE, by Fred Wood (Nintendo Switch, Steam, Itch.io, Google Play)
snippet.description:
www.love-the-game.com
LOVE is a simple, short platforming game by Fred Wood. Originally created in 2008 and released commercially in 2014, the game has seen a number of updates as well as a sequel (LOVE 2: kuso). This trailer is made to commemorate the biggest update to the game yet, a full 60 FPS overhaul.

LOVE can be found for $2.99 on Steam, Nintendo Switch, itch.io, Ouya, and more.
